title: Convert amounts into first equation

title: Convert amoutn into second equation
text: Because the total amount is how much she paid ($1,669.68) and there is an interest rate of 10.5% from bank and 5.9% from federal, we can determine that the second equation is $$0.105b+0.059f=1, 669.68$$

title: Isolate Variable

title: Plug in
text: We can plug in $$b=21, 540-f$$ using the second equation to get $$0.105(21,540-f)f+0.059=1,669.68$$
